question: i am unemployed and facing lot of problems canu please tell some prayers by which my problem can be solved
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Jazakallah for your question.

Please elaborate what is preventing you from obtaining employment. Do you have any skills and qualifications which you can apply so that you can become self employed? Make sure to be very punctual with your five daily salaah and perform nafl salaah too, if you can. Recite the Quran daily and keep yourself constantly busy in zikr, (remember Allah Ta'ala constantly.)

Also recite, ?Allaahumma ikfiniy bihalaalika an haraamika, wa aghniniy bifadhlika amman siwaaka.?

I await your reply. May Allah Ta'ala ease your difficulties and hardships, ameen.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

2SOCIAL DEPT.
